title: Instant pot Chicken gizzards and hearts stew
directions: Start the saute mode and add 3 tablespoons of olive oil
When it starts sizzling add the chopped onions
Stir frequently while sauteing
When the onion starts to brown, cancel the saute mode
Dice the root vegetables in 1/4" pieces, excluding potatoes and add them to the instant pot
Wash well the gizzards
Remove any yellow membranes when found and cut into bite-size pieces
If using vegetable broth, add 14 oz in the pot
else replace it with 10-14 oz of water and 1 tablespoon of salt
Add 1/2 teaspoon of black ground pepper and stir everything
Cover the pot and seal the venting valve
Set on manual mode on high pressure for 30 minutes
Do a quick release immediately
Dice the potatoes in 1-inch cubes
And add them to the pot
Chop the garlic and add it to the pot
Add 3 bay leaves and a teaspoon of paprika
Add 4-5 tablespoons of aromatic herbs like parsley,
basil, Italian seasoning or a combination of them
Open the 6 oz can of tomatoes paste and add all of it
Stir everything, cover the pot and close the valve
Set to manual mode on high pressure
Set the timer between 7 and 10 minutes to cook the potatoes
to your liking, more time for bigger chunks
When cooking stops, allow for a natural release until the
safety pin drops and you can open it
ingredients: 1 lb of root veggies like carrots, parsley, parsnips, celery root
2-3 tablespoons of aromatic herbs like basil, parsley, Italian seasoning
14 oz of chicken or vegetable broth
